Sentencas: The placement of reference electrodes in solid state ionic conductors is not as flexible as in liquid state electrochemistry.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: This is in particular a problem when material from the gas phase is involved, as in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: Many of the arrangements used are problematic: either they produce results that are very sensitive to electrode placement, change the potential distribution, do not provide a uniform current density and overpotential at the electrode or require delicate patterns liable to fail.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: We here present a new approach suitable for thin layer SOFC.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: It includes a calibration procedure derived from numerical simulations in combination with experiments.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: This allows the use of the common three-electrode arrangement on thin solid electrolyte (SEs) where the reference electrode is placed side by side with the working electrode, on an extension of the thin layer SE.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: This is so despite the sensitivity of that arrangement to both misalignment of the electrodes and to a difference in the impedance of the two current carrying electrodes.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: The misalignment tolerated, with the present method, may exceed the SE thickness.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: The allowed misalignment increases with the electrode/SE impedance ratio.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: The method copes also with the difference in the electrode impedance.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: Two special configurations are discussed in which the calibration is not required.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells

Sentencas: However, these require a more accurate preparation technique of the cell.
Titulo: Placement of reference electrode in solid electrolyte cells
